name: Tandoori Chicken
steps: Deeply score Chicken Legs (to increase their surface area)
Mix Salt, Garam Masala, Paprika, and Ground Cayenne
Mix with Lemon Juice, Yogurt, and Ginger-Garlic Paste
Marinate Chicken Legs in the Mixture for 2-24 hours
Put an oven-safe grate on a pan
Place the marinated chicken legs on the grate
Put the chicken/grate/pan on the top oven rack for 6 minutes
Flip the chicken legs and put back on the top rack for 6 minutes
Move the chicken to a lower oven rack for another 30 minutes
Pull out and let sit for 10 minutes to finish carry-over cooking
comments: Save leftovers, great to reheat when making Chicken Tikka Masala
